description: This class involves intense physical training that builds strength and fitness through group intervals over a one hour time period.
HIIT refers to a very specific and particular type of trainingâ€”and it's possible to do interval training without actually doing a real HIIT workout.
This style of yoga is more intense, similar to Ashtanga and some Vinyasa. You will focus on strength and endurance, as well as flexibility and relaxation.
Exercise Balls have many uses in Pilates. While they can be used as a simple support, they can engage all your core muscles by making balancing more of a challenge.
